com.relteq.sirius.simulator
Interface InterfaceSensor

All Known Implementing Classes:
_Sensor
public interface InterfaceSensor

Interface implemented by all sensors.

Method Summary
 java.lang.Double[] getDensityInVPM()
          Measured density per vehicle type in veh/mile.
 java.lang.Double[] getFlowInVPH()
          Measured flow per vehicle type in veh/hr.

          Measured speed in mile/hr.

Method Detail

getDensityInVPM

java.lang.Double[] getDensityInVPM()
Measured density per vehicle type in veh/mile.

The output array contains measured densities. The array is organized by vehicle type in the order in which they appear in the settings block of the configuration file (see _Scenario.getVehicleTypeNames()).

Returns:
Array of densities.

getTotalDensityInVPM

double getTotalDensityInVPM()
Measured total density in veh/mile.

Returns the total density measured by the sensor. Must equal the sum of values in getDensityInVPM().

Returns:
A double with the total measured density in veh/mile.

getFlowInVPH

java.lang.Double[] getFlowInVPH()
Measured flow per vehicle type in veh/hr.

The output array contains measured flows. The array is organized by vehicle type in the order in which they appear in the settings block of the configuration file (see _Scenario.getVehicleTypeNames()).

Returns:
Array of flows.

getTotalFlowInVPH

double getTotalFlowInVPH()
Measured total flow in veh/hr.

Returns the total flow measured by the sensor. Must equal the sum of values in getFlowInVPH().

Returns:
A double with the total measured flow in veh/hr.

getSpeedInMPH

double getSpeedInMPH()
Measured speed in mile/hr.

Returns the speed measured by the sensor.

Returns:
A double with the measured speed in mile/hr.
